official_title: A bill to amend the Tennessee Valley Authority Act of 1933 to make the enhancement of the economic and social well-being of people residing and owning property in the Tennessee and Mississippi River Basins a purpose of that Act.

summary.text: Amends the Tennessee Valley Authority Act of 1933 to make recreational development and the enhancement of the economic and social well-being of people residing or owning property in the Tennessee River and Mississippi River Basins purposes of such Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Tennessee Valley Authority Act of 1933 to make the enhancement of the economic and social well-being of people residing and owning property in the Tennessee and Mississippi River Basins a purpose of that Act.
